name: IOC Threat Hunt - FortiSIEM
description: Performs FortiSIEM IOC Hunting on the specified IOC.

arguments.host_or_doamin: {% set ls_length = vars.indicator_mapping[vars.ioc_type] | length %}{% for item in vars.indicator_mapping[vars.ioc_type] %}{% if loop.index < ls_length %}{{item}} IN ("{{vars.ioc_value.replace(',','","')}}") OR {% else %}{{item}} IN ("{{vars.ioc_value.replace(',','","')}}"){% endif %}{% endfor %}
arguments.ip_search_query: {% set ls_length = vars.indicator_mapping[vars.ioc_type] | length %}{% for item in vars.indicator_mapping[vars.ioc_type] %}{% if loop.index < ls_length %}{{item}} IN ({{vars.ioc_value}}) OR {% else %}{{item}} IN ({{vars.ioc_value}}){% endif %}{% endfor %}

resource.name: Outbreak IOC Hunt - FortiSIEM - {{(arrow.utcnow() | string).split('T')[0]}}

arguments.operationTitle: Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table
Utils: Convert JSON into a HTML Table

arguments.event_data: {% set event_data = [] %}{% for item in vars.steps.Hunt_User_Name.data.events %}{% set _temp = item.attributes.pop('rawEventMsg') %}{% set _ = event_data.append(item.attributes) %}{% endfor %}{% for item in vars.steps.Hunt_Other_IOC.data.events %}{% set _temp = item.attributes.pop('rawEventMsg') %}{% set _ = event_data.append(item.attributes) %}{% endfor %}{% for item in vars.steps.Hunt_Domain_Name.data.events %}{% set _temp = item.attributes.pop('rawEventMsg') %}{% set _ = event_data.append(item.attributes) %}{% endfor %}{% for item in vars.steps.Hunt_IP_Domain_Host.data.events %}{% set _temp = item.attributes.pop('rawEventMsg') %}{% set _ = event_data.append(item.attributes) %}{% endfor %}{% for item in vars.steps.Hunt_Process_Name.data.events %}{% set _temp = item.attributes.pop('rawEventMsg') %}{% set _ = event_data.append(item.attributes) %}{% endfor %}{% for item in vars.steps.Hunt_FileHash.data.events %}{% set _temp = item.attributes.pop('rawEventMsg') %}{% set _ = event_data.append(item.attributes) %}{% endfor %}{{event_data}}

arguments.name: Fortinet FortiSIEM

params.reportName: Top FortiSIEM Events By Severity, Count
